DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate drug-drug interaction CKD-346 ( Telmisartan/S-Amlodipine , Rosuvastatin )
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , open-label , multiple-dose , two-arm , one-sequence · crossover study evaluate safety pharmacokinetics oral concurrent administration telmisartan/s-amlodipine rosuvastatin healthy volunteer .

The subject previous history clinically significant cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , endocrine , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological , psychiatric , malignancy . 2 . Have gastrointestinal disease history affect drug absorption ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , etc . ) surgery ( except simple appendectomy hernia surgery ) . 3 . Defined follow laboratory parameter : Hemoglobin < 13.0 g/dL ( male ) , Hemoglobin < 12.0 g/dL ( female ) AST , ALT > 1.25* upper limit normal range Total bilirubin > 1.5* upper limit normal range CPK > 1.5* upper limit normal range eGFR ( use MDRD method ) < 60 mL/min/1.73m2 6 . Sitting SBP > 150 mmHg < 90 mmHg , Sitting DBP > 100 mmHg < 50 mmHg , 5minuts break . 7 . Drug abuse history drug abuse show positive urine drug test . 8 . Female Participant pregnant lactate 9 . A heavy caffeine consumer ( caffeine > 5cups/day ) , alcohol consumer ( alcohol > 210g/week ) , smoker ( cigarette > 10cigarettes/day ) 10 .
